text: Luis Jaime Carvajal y Salas (born 29 October 1942) is a Spanish equestrian. He competed in the team jumping event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Spain Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 1979 Mediterranean Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Spain Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in equestrian
title: Luis Jaime Carvajal y Salas
